articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Politically-motivated Suppression of Chongryon Assailed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Politically-motivated Suppression of Chongryon Assailed
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Korean Society for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries issued a statement Monday to denounce the Japanese reactionaries for searching houses of the chairman and the vice-chairman of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) by mobilizing dozens of policemen and even an armored car on March 26.
					 The chairman and the vice-chairman are deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and leading officials of the dignified overseas Koreans' organization.
					
					 Japan is under legal and moral obligation to defend the rights and look after the life of the Koreans in Japan who are victims of its past crimes, and guarantee the activities of Chongryon as it enforced medieval colonial rule over Korea for over 40 years after illegally  occupying Korea, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries, however, viciously committed anti-DPRK and anti-Chongryon acts, persistently evading the redemption of the past crimes although 70 years have passed since Japan's defeat. Their recent raid into the houses of the leading officials of Chongryon proves what extent their hostility toward the DPRK and the Korean nation has reached.
					
					 After the Japanese police authorities conducted the search while deliberately linking Chongryon with suspicious involvement in a case without any legal validity and scientific ground, not only the Japanese legal circle and media but also people of other social standings in Japan have denounced the recent action as an illegal investigation in violation of the Japan Constitution and the criminal procedure law, abuse of rights of Koreans in Japan and national discrimination.
					
					 The Korean Society for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries vehemently denounces the Japanese reactionaries' search as a wanton violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK, reckless politically-motivated suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and an anachronistic confrontational act of inciting hostility between the peoples of the DPRK and Japan.
					
					 The Society, availing itself of the opportunity, expressed the belief that Japanese from all walks of life and the broad masses of the world that value justice and human rights would become increasingly vocal in rejecting and denouncing the Japanese reactionaries' anachronistic anti-DPRK and anti-Chongryon acts of pushing the DPRK-Japan relations to rock bottom and fanning up mistrust and antagonism between the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from New Chinese Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from New Chinese Ambassador
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received  credentials  from Li Chenqun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: Greetings to Political Party of DR Congo
articles.content:
Greetings to Political Party of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on Monday sent a message of greeting to the National Executive Committee of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo on the occasion of the 13th anniversary of its founding.
					 The message wished the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo great successes in its work to strengthen the party and achieve the prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties would grow stronger.

articles.title: Enlarged Plenary Meeting of C.C., Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea Held
articles.content:
Enlarged Plenary Meeting of C.C., Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea Held
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- There took place here on Monday the 71st enlarged plenary meeting of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea.
					 It was attended by members and alternate members of the Central Committee of the union and its officials in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 The meeting discussed the issue of devotedly implementing  the important tasks set forth in the historic conclusion made by Marshal Kim Jong Un at the enlarged meeting of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea..
					
					 A report was made by Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the union, to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that Kim Jong Un's historic conclusion serves as a militant banner which all officials and members of the union should hold high to successfully carry out the last instructions of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They referred to the successes and shortcomings in the work of the union during the past three years and set forth tasks and ways to bring about a radical turn in the drive for thoroughly carrying out the last instructions of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: 4th April Spring People's Art Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
4th April Spring People's Art Festival to Be Held
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The 4th April Spring People's Art Festival will be held in Pyongyang on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It is a great art festival which was provided by leader Kim Jong Il, reflecting the unanimous desire of the people to hold in high esteem forever Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea and the eternal image of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 The festival will bring together members of art organizations, art squads and itinerant art groups of Pyongyang and local areas and members of art groups. Divided into different categories, the festival will take place in the form of individual, group and joint performances at theatres, concert halls and cultural houses in Pyongyang from April 11 to 17.
					
					 The festival will be featured by presentation of songs praising the President. It will mark an important occasion of singing high praises of the revolutionary careers and immortal feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and putting strong spurs to the development of Juche arts and the building of high civilized socialist nation.

articles.title: Performance Given for Participants in National Conference of Sportspeople
articles.content:
Performance Given for Participants in National Conference of Sportspeople
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 7th National Conference of Sportspeople enjoyed an art performance "Songs Full of Memories".
					 Veteran artistes of the Mansudae Art Troupe, the Pochonbo Electronic Ensemble and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe who grew up as famous singers and instrumentalists under the care of leader Kim Jong Il and made contributions to the efflorescence of the Juche arts put on the stage monumental masterpieces which represented the great era of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In prelude orchestral music and chorus "The General Will Live Forever as the Sun" and such numbers as male solo and pangchang "Song of Comradeship" and male solo and male chorus "The Path of a Soldier" they sang high praises of the undying feats performed by Kim Jong Il which would go down in the history of the country.
					
					 Their repertoire also included such numbers like immortal classic masterpiece "Song of Loyalty", "Spring Reflecting Loving Care" and
					
					"Don't Advance, Night of Pyongyang".
					
					 The performance was highly acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Preparations for New School Year Nearing Completion
articles.content:
Preparations for New School Year Nearing Completion
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Preparations for new school year are being successfully wound up in the DPRK.
					 The Education Commission and officials and teachers across the country have energetically stepped up the preparations with emphasis on decisively improving the quality of the universal 12-year compulsory education.
					
					 Officials and teachers of schools at all levels are channeling efforts into putting the education into practicable, comprehensive and modern basis.
					
					 Primary schools including Kim Song Ju Primary School in Pyongyang, Haean Primary School in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province and Suwon Primary School in Pohang District, Chongjin City, North Hamgyong Province are making perfect arrangements for improving the quality of overall subjects while fully ensuring the teaching of new subjects.
					
					 Senior secondary and junior secondary schools across the country mapped out teaching programs to give practical knowledge to students by combining theoretical education with practical education and fully prepared equipment and materials for experiment and practice and visual aid materials.
					
					 Party and power organs rendered sincere help in making preparations for the new school year.
					
					  Senior officials of party and power bodies in every province, city (district) and county including Pyongyang, North Phyongan Province, Kanggye City, Chollima District in Nampho City and Sepho County made efforts to establish social traits of attaching  importance to the education and took the lead in providing good educational conditions and environment.
					
					 Thanks to the support of ministries, national institutions, industrial establishments and cooperative farms, educational institutions at all levels are given face-lifting.
					
					 Meanwhile, the supply of textbooks, reference books, uniforms and school things to students across the country before the opening of the new school year is making progress as scheduled.

articles.title: Korean Rehabilitation Centre for Children with Disability Opens
articles.content:
Korean Rehabilitation Centre for Children with Disability Opens
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Korean Rehabilitation Centre for Children with Disability started classes with due ceremony on Monday.
					 Present there were Kim Mun Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled, and teachers and children with disability of the center and their parents.
					
					 Speakers said that the centre has made great progress in treatment and upbringing of children with disability.
					
					 Children with disability will enjoy a happy life under the loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea, they noted.
					
					 The participants went round the center.

articles.title: 6MN Extrusion Press Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
6MN Extrusion Press Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Mechanical Engineering Institute under the DPRK State Academy of Sciences recently developed a CNC-based 6MN extrusion press.
					 The press is used for extruding nonferrous metal tubes of different sizes. 
					
					 It was already applied to the production of duralumin tube, which raises the productivity 2.5 times.

articles.title: Land Management Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Land Management Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Land management is gaining momentum in different parts of the DPRK.
					 Pyongyang City is meticulously organizing the work to repair roads, bridges, dwelling houses and public buildings and put sewage networks in good condition.
					
					 Districts and counties along Taedong and Pothong rivers have paid big efforts to dredging rivers and repairing embankments.
					
					 A large number of good species of trees has been planted in streets, villages, compounds and campuses.
					
					 Jagang Province began repairing roads between Wiwon and Manpho and between Wiwon and Kanggye. And Wiwon County has built retaining walls reaching several thousand meters.
					
					 Yodok and other counties in Hamgyong Province are pushing ahead with the construction of several bridges.
					
					 North Hamgyong Province is also pushing forward spring land management while planting many trees along rivers and streams.
					
					 Taedong County in South Phyongan Province, too, has worked hard to repair embankments and dredge rivers.

articles.title: Peculiar Industrial Art Works Produced
articles.content:
Peculiar Industrial Art Works Produced 
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Creators, researchers, teachers and students of different units have created peculiar industrial art works conducive to economic construction and improvement of the people's living standard. 
					 Colorful trademarks, advertisement and dresses combined their utility with people's aesthetical demand and had formative art applied to them. 
					
					 Specialists and fans showed deep interest in designs of the signboard of catering establishment inside the Terminal No. 2 of Pyongyang International Airport, guide-map of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and the mark of general production control room of the Sepho Area Stockbreeding Management Committee, etc. as their characteristic features were vividly represented and formative art was applied to writing style. 
					
					 The Mansudae Art Studio, the Korean Industrial Art Studio, the Pyongyang City Industrial Art Studio, Pyongyang University of Fine Arts, Pyongyang University of Printing and other units presented various designs that cater for the aesthetic feelings and sentiment of the Korean people.
					
					 "Maebongsan" trademark of the Wonsan Shoes Factory, the chandelier design of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, designs of logos of sports teams at all levels, design of decoration of bean-based milk van satisfied the taste of people including sportspersons and youth and students.
					
					 The designs of uniform for staff members of the Pyongyang International Airport and winter riding dress for the Mirim Riding Club were also highly appreciated by people for their peculiar designs.  
					
					 The designs of trademarks of goods from the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Processing Factory showed well the life of the Korean people reaching ever higher level of civilization as they vividly portrayed the peculiar nature of a variety of products.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules EU Blindly Following U.S.
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules EU Blindly Following U.S.
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Some European countries are blindly following the U.S., unaware of its ulterior design to throw whole Europe into an abyss of confusion and confrontation and bring down EU at last.
					 Since the outbreak of a civil war in Ukraine, EU has slapped sanctions against Russia's economy and finance several times and put embargo on export of weapons, transfer of double-use technology and latest technology and sale of up-to-date technical equipment for oil development to Russia.
					
					 But the European countries have suffered huge losses in their economy for taking the lead in imposing sanctions upon Russia.
					
					 Alexey Pushkov, chairman of the International Affairs Committee of the Russian State Duma, was quoted on Mar. 16 as saying that the losses suffered by EU due to its worsened relations with Russia ran into 21 billion to 40 billion US dollars.
					
					 All the fields of EU economy including agriculture weakened and value of euro dropped.
					
					 Agricultural products businesses in Netherlands, Poland, Greece and Bulgaria have suffered heavy losses. Economic losses of Lithuania reached 230 million euros.
					
					150,000 workers in member states of EU lost their jobs. 25,000 workers in Poland became jobless and 21,000 in Germany.
					
					It was reported by the German government that the country would lose 300,000 jobs in case its trade relations with Russia collapse in the future.
					
					 EU will reportedly suffer losses amounting to 50 billion euros (62 billion US dollars) this year due to the countermeasures taken by Russia.
					
					 But the amount of the losses suffered by the U.S. for imposing sanctions upon Russia is almost negligible. 
					
					 The article titled "sanctions have not caused big damage to the U.S.-Russia trade" posted on the Russian internet news service Inosmi. Ru on Mar. 18 noted that the volume of the U.S.-Russia trade was not so big from its beginning and it is difficult to estimate the impact of the sanctions on it as most of the U.S. companies have not stopped their cooperation with Russia.
					
					 According to information announced by a relevant U.S. agency, the volume of the U.S. export to Russia from March to December, 2014 was 8.94 billion US dollars, which was less than 9.4 billion U.S. dollars in the same period of 2013.
					
					 Russia is an "inseparable neighbor" of EU in the light of geopolitics as their interests are complicatedly intermingled.
					
					 The annual volume of trade between EU and Russia amounts to about 460 billion US dollars but that between the U.S. and Russia is just 40 billion US dollars.
					
					 However, there is division among the EU member states over the issue of the U.S. call for slapping tougher sanctions against Russia.
					
					 The pan-Europe TV channel Euronews on Mar. 4 reported that the possibility of collapse of the euro zone is increasing. 38 percent of the European investors predict that the euro zone may be divided in a year to come and this possibility will reach an all-time high as compared with that in the past 2 years.
					
					 The division of EU and the danger of the euro zone's collapse are something which the U.S. desires.
					
					 The U.S. act of plugging EU into imposing sanctions upon Russia is aimed to bring down EU together with Russia.
					
					 The U.S. works hard to slow down its decline even a bit at the sacrifice of its allies including the European countries.
					
					 This stark reality brings shame to European countries.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Hits out at S. Korean Puppet Group's Anti-DPRK Charades
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Hits out at S. Korean Puppet Group's Anti-DPRK Charades
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet minister of Unification and the representative of the "Saenuri Party" insisted that the Cheonan warship was "torpedoed by the north," citing the "results of international joint investigation." They even talked about "merciless provocation" and "the same lie as the one in the past."  
					 The puppet minister of Defense and other war maniacs went so ridiculous as to cry out for taking "perfect posture" and meting  out "resolute punishment" and the like, making much fuss about "torpedo attack by the north" and "its responsibility."
					
					 The chief executive of south Korea at the "memorial service" held on Mar. 26 five years since the warship sinking case pulled up the DPRK, talking such rubbish as "it should stop its reckless provocations, drop its thought that nuclear weapons can protect it and take the road of true changes."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:  The south Korean puppet group is kicking up again confrontation hysteria against the DPRK, making much fuss over the warship sinking case which has nothing to do with it and going the lengths of malignantly hurting its line and policies. These are intolerable provocations.
					
					 Disclosing the ulterior design sought by the south Korean puppet group in misleading the public opinion by creating impression that the warship was sunken "by the north's torpedo attack" in a bid to shift the blame for it onto the north at any cost, the commentary says:
					
					 What the puppet group seeks is to insist with a strong arm on the claim that the north was to blame for the case, though the truth behind the conspiratorial case has been laid bare. By doing so, it also seeks to quell the voices of people from all walks of life calling for lifting the "May 24 step" and removing other hurdles lying in the way of achieving reunification under the signboard of "adherence to principle," invent a pretext for provocation and continue using the case as a card for escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 The behavior of the puppet group is nothing but the desperate frenzy of the criminals whose true colors as cruel murderers and confrontation maniacs have been brought to light. This reminds one of the adage that the thief is afraid of his own shadow. But liars have short wings.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities Flailed for Blocking Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities Flailed for Blocking Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea issued a statement on March 27 to denounce the puppet authorities for blocking the probe into the truth about ferry Sewol disaster.
					 The puppet Ministry of Marine and Fishery is working hard to institute an "enforcement ordinance" related to the special law on the ferry Sewol disaster, the statement charged.
					
					 What is important in probing the truth about disaster is an unlimited and independent probe and this is by no means an issue which can be comprised, it held.
					
					 The above-said "enforcement ordinance" is aimed to neutralize the independent position of the ad hoc committee and put its activities under the control of the "government", it said, terming it an ordinance for control and interference.

articles.title: Beninese Political Party Highly Praises Illustrious Leaders of DPRK
articles.content:
Beninese Political Party Highly Praises Illustrious Leaders of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Benin released a statement on March 25 in support of the appeal of the 19th seminar of political parties of the world on building a new society.
					 Expressing full support for the appeal on celebrating with splendor the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) as grand international political festivals, the statement said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung achieved national liberation through a long bloody anti-Japanese war and realized the cause of the party founding. These marked historical events which brought about a fundamental turn in hewing out the destiny of the Korean people.
					
					 The history of the WPK and the DPRK is one of proud victory and brilliant succession as they witnessed epoch-making miracles and changes under the guidance of the President and HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The ever-victorious history and traditions of the WPK are being creditably carried forward by HE Kim Jong Un, another peerlessly great man.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Benin will highly praise the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un by significantly organizing colorful political and cultural events on the said occasions.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Figures of Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Figures of Myanmar
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Personages of Myanmar released statements on March 20 and 24 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The general manager of the Mit Tarmo Publishing House of Myanmar said that Kim Il Sung was a peerlessly elder statesman and father of the people as he made the Korean people most independent and creative people by founding the Juche idea in his early years and made an immortal contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					 Convinced that the behests of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il would be surely carried out under the guidance of respected HE Kim Jong Un, I extend firm support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle.
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, recollected with deep respect the immortal exploits the President performed by dedicating himself to the prosperity of the country, happiness of the people and global independence.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President was a great leader and iron-willed commander as he liberated the country from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and led the cause of socialism of the Korean people and cause of independence of the progressive peoples of the world to victory.
					
					 The Korean people have worked astonishing miracles in building an economic power and improving the people's living standard and bolstered up the defence capabilities of the country in every way under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 I express support and solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving national reunification.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Nigeria and Guinea
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Nigeria and Guinea
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of opening a week of the Korean photo exhibition and film show took place in Nigeria and a lecture in Guinea on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos dealing with the exploits performed by the President.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos showing the true picture of Songun Korea.
					
					 The participants in the film show watched a Korean film "Monument to Party Founding".
					
					 The director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria said that the President liberated Korea which groaned under the military occupation of the Japanese imperialists and built the first people's democratic state in the East by holding high the banner of Juche. He went on:
					
					 The President inflicted upon the U.S.  a bitter defeat, the first of its kind in history, though it boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, and brought about the beginning of decline for the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 After watching the film, an official of Imo State, Nigeria, noted:
					
					 The President created a brilliant model in building a revolutionary party in the era of independence.
					
					 He found himself among popular masses with firm faith that they are the driving force of the revolution and laid a foundation for founding the party by way of organizing basic party organizations.
					
					 Thanks to such firm organizational and ideological foundation for party founding the Workers' Party of Korea was founded on October 10, 1945, right after the liberation of the country.
					
					 An official of a Guinean factory said in a lecture that the kind-hearted image of the President would always be remembered not only by the Korean people but by progressive mankind.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Iceland
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Iceland
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- An Icelandic preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Reykjavik on March 25.
					 Jon Arni Halldorsson, general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events to praise the undying feats performed by the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Organizations of various countries posted articles on their websites to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on its website an article titled "Father of people" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung on Mar. 23.
					
					 The article noted that Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, was called tender-hearted father by its people.
					
					 Thanks to the President, possessed of warm love for the people, the DPRK enforced universal free medical care and education from long ago and the party and state considered it as the supreme principle of their activities to improve the standard of people's living.
					
					 He made ceaseless journeys for field guidance to provide the people with a happy life.
					
					 All places of the country, from remote mountain villages to villages on far-flung islands, are associated with his leadership feats and loving care.
					
					 Recalling facts that he provided the school youth and children throughout the country with new uniforms and personally photographed them, very pleased to see them in new uniforms, the article said it was quite natural for the children to respect him, calling him their father.
					
					 It echoed what foreigners said after being received by him.
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany also posted an article praising his popular personality on its website on Mar. 19.
					
					 The Venezuelan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article titled "Fruition of idea of Workers' Party of Korea on giving priority to science and talents" on Mar. 18, illustrated with photos dealing with the validity and vitality of the idea of giving importance to science and talents now being fully displayed under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted a video clip introducing "Okryu Children's Hospital built under benevolent socialist system" on its website on Mar. 14.

articles.title: Romanian Political Party to Observe Important Days of DPRK
articles.content:
Romanian Political Party to Observe Important Days of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Romania released a statement on Mar. 25 in response to the appeal made at the 19th seminar of world political parties on building a new society.
					 Noting that the international seminar of world political parties on building a new society is held every year as an international event to encourage the independent countries and peoples in their struggle against the political, economic and military offensives of the imperialists, the statement said:
					
					 The 19th seminar called on the communist parties and workers' parties throughout the world to celebrate with splendor the 70th anniversaries of the liberation of Korea and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) as grand world-wide political festivals.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Romania warmly congratulates once again the WPK and the Korean people on greeting their significant events and actively supports the appeal.
					
					 It will organize a preparatory committee and hold diverse events throughout Romania to celebrate with splendor the anniversaries.
					
					 The WPK and the Korean people led by Marshal Kim Jong Un will register bigger successes in this significant year's drive for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Denounce U.S. Colonial Rule and S. Korea's Sycophancy
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Denounce U.S. Colonial Rule and S. Korea's Sycophancy 
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on March 22 to denounce the U.S. moves to strengthen the colonial rule over south Korea and the south Korean puppet forces' sycophancy towards U.S. and treachery.
					 The statement said that the National Reunification Institute of the DPRK on March 21 released a white paper disclosing the reality of south Korea as a total colony of the U.S. and despicable acts of pro-U.S. lackeys.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 South Korea is totally dependent on the U.S. in political, military, economic, cultural and all other fields.
					
					 The south Korean puppet army is nothing but a colonial mercenary one which is not allowed to move even a step without direct order of the American commander in south Korea.
					
					 In south Korea the U.S. forces enjoy extraterritorial rights and they are free from any punishment even after committing all kinds of crimes including murder and rape.
					
					 Media of the world describe south Korea as "51st State" of the U.S., deploring its miserable reality.
					
					 As long as pro-U.S. lackeys are allowed to stay in power, south Korea will never be able to free from the colonial yoke of the U.S. 
					
					 That is why the south Korean people are staging dynamic actions for overthrowing those sycophantic forces and achieving the independent reunification of the country free from foreign interference.

articles.title: Departamento de Politica del CDN critica abuso del incidente de "Cheonan" en campana fratricida
articles.content:
Departamento de Politica del CDN critica abuso del incidente de "Cheonan" en campana fratricida
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 5o aniversario de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan", la banda de Park Geun-hye recrudece en toda la extension surcoreana la atmosfera conflictiva con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En la "ceremonia de recordacion" de los muertos en ese incidente, efectuada el dia 26 en "Hyonchungwon" de Taejon, Park Geun-hye insistio en que la corbeta "Cheonan" se hundio "por el ataque sorpresivo de torpedo de alguien".
					
					Al decir que la RPDC "debe desistir de imprudentes actos provocadores", trato de hacer creer como cierto que "el hundimiento de la corbeta fue obra del Norte de Corea".
					
					Para colmo, volvio a exigir la "renuncia nuclear del Norte" diciendo que "este no puede defenderse con el arma nuclear". Se atrevio a criticar de una manera u otra la justa politica y regimen de la RPDC haciendo referencia al "aislamiento", "naturaleza" y "verdadero cambio".
					
					En exclusiva con el Periodico Joson Inmingun concedida el dia 29, el vocero del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC respondio como sigue:
					
					La banda de Park Geun-hye repetira el destino tragico de su antecesor traidor Lee Myung Bak, echado al basurero de la historia, si sigue difundiendo el rumor de que el "hundimiento de Cheonan es obra del Norte" y manteniendo las "medidas del 24 de mayo".
					
					Tal fiebre conflictiva de ella se ha manifestado tambien en las conductas de sus inferiores de los Ministerios de Defensa Nacional y de Unificacion.
					
					El Ministerio de Unificacion insiste absurdamente en que "el accidente de 'Cheonan' es causado por el Norte de Corea y esto fue esclarecido a base del resultado de investigacion conjunta internacional".
					
					Abogo por la necesidad de mantener las "medidas del 24 de mayo" usando expresiones como la "tergiversacion de verdad" y las "medidas responsables".
					
					El ministro de Defensa Nacional visito de repente la sala de control de comando de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor del ejercito titere surcoreano con motivo del 5o aniversario del hundimiento de la corbeta. En esa ocasion actuo con fanfarroneria ordenando el "chequeo del estado de disposicion militar" y el "de preparacion perfecta para doblegar la provocacion del enemigo". Entre tanto, los belicistas de la capa militar desarrollaron diariamente en el Mar Oeste junto con Estados Unidos los ejercicios moviles maritimos bajo el pretexto de defender la "linea de limite al Norte" y "disuadir la provocacion".
					
					Por otra parte, las escorias humanas, que habian anunciado el "cese de lanzamiento de volantes" cogiendo miedo a la declaracion de implacable castigo fisico de la RPDC, estan desesperadas ahora por reanudar el lanzamiento de octavillas bajo el amparo de las autoridades titeres surcoreanas que describen "la libertad de expresion" como intocable "derecho principal del pueblo".
					
					Asi son inimaginables los actos imprudentes que comete la banda de Park con motivo del dia de ocurrencia del incidente de "Cheonan".
					
					Pero, a pesar del hostigamiento brutal a las "fuerzas pro-Norte" y de la "dictadura de Yusin", resulta aplastante hoy tambien la opinion de los habitantes surcoreanos de distintos sectores que no creen el reporte manipulado de las autoridades de que la corbeta fue hundida por el "ataque del Norte".
					
					El dialogo de que habla Park no pasa de ser una hipocresia barata para enganar y burlar a los nacionales y extranjeros.
					
					Mientras se mantengan en el poder Park y sus compinches, no se podra esperar mas el mejoramiento de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Es invariable la posicion de la RPDC de no tratarse con los connotados maniacos de enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					Ser tratados o no por toda la nacion como segunda banda de Lee Myung Bak y horda de cadaveres vivos, esto depende totalmente de Park Geun-hye y sus seguidores.

articles.title: Asociacion de Intercambio Corea-Japon condena represion contra la Chongryon en Japon
articles.content:
Asociacion de Intercambio Corea-Japon condena represion contra la Chongryon en Japon
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- El dia 26, las autoridades policiales de Japon registraron forzadamente movilizando decenas de policias y carros blindados los domicilios del presidente y el vicepresidente del Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) y otros funcionarios de esta organizacion.
					El presidente y el vicepresidente son diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y cuadros responsables de esa entidad legitima de ciudadanos coreanos en ultramar.
					
					Para condenar ese acto fascista, la Asociacion de Intercambio Corea-Japon publico el dia 28 la siguiente declaracion:
					
					Ahora, los injustos y viles actos hostiles de Japon contra la RPDC y la Chongryon deparan fuertes protestas, condenas y vehemente indignacion en el interior y exterior del pais.
					
					Tales atrocidades de las autoridades policiales de Japon, que coinciden con la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC lanzada por EE.UU. en la arena internacional, parten del plan norteamericano de asfixiar a la RPDC con la "sancion" superdura y "derrumbar su regimen".
					
					No se puede pasar por alto el reciente acto gangsteril de Japon, que si bien se cree "Estado constitucional", actua como abanderado de la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y reprime a la Chongryon atribuyendole las sospechas de un incidente sin justificacion legal ni fundamente cientifico.
					
					Chongryon es legitima entidad de ciudadanos en ultramar de la RPDC que defiende todos los derechos democraticos nacionales de los coreanos en Japon y desempena el papel de representacion diplomatica puesto que no hay relaciones diplomaticas entre la RPDC y Japon.
					
					La Asociacion de Intercambio de Corea-Japon condena categoricamente la represion a los cuadros de Chongryon calificandola de violacion ilegal de DDHH y atentado imperdonable contra la soberania de la RPDC.
					
					Sera muy equivocado si Japon piensa que puede estar sano y salvo aunque reprime a los coreanos en Japon, victimas de colonialismo japones, sin indemnizar todavia sus crimenes antieticos a pesar de que pasaron 70 anos desde su derrota en la segunda guerra mundial.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deberan pedir disculpas por su acto fascista y castigar a los responsables.
					
					Japon sera totalmente responsable si el presente incidente produce consecuencias negativas en la implementacion de la Declaracion Corea-Japon de Pyongyang y del Acuerdo de Estocolmo.

articles.title: ACRCE denuncia represion politica de reaccionarios japoneses contra Chongryon
articles.content:
ACRCE denuncia represion politica de reaccionarios japoneses contra Chongryon
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- La Asociacion Coreana para las Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero hizo publica hoy una declaracion en relacion con que el dia 26, los reaccionarios japoneses cometieron el acto fascista de registrar movilizando decenas de policias y hasta los carros blindados las casas del presidente y el vicepresidente del Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de los Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon), quienes son diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y jefes de esa digna entidad de coreanos en ultramar.
					La nota destaca que el pais isla, que ocupo ilegalmente a Corea y practico durante mas de 40 anos el coloniaje medieval, tiene la obligacion juridica y moral de defender los derechos humanos y la vida de los coreanos residentes en su pais, victimas de sus crimenes del pasado, y garantizar las actividades de la Chongryon, y prosigue:
					
					Sin embargo, los reaccionarios japoneses vinieron lanzando la campana anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon evadiendo a toda costa la liquidacion de sus crimenes del pasado hasta hoy dia en que se acerca el 70o aniversario de su derrota en la segunda guerra mundial. 
					
					La arremetida ilegal contra los domicilios de los cuadros de la Chongryon deja conocer a que grado ha llegado la conciencia hostil de aquellos sobre la RPDC y la nacion coreana.
					
					En cuanto al registro forzado que cometieron las autoridades policiales japonesas vinculando la Chongryon con las sospechas de algun incidente sin ninguna razon legal ni fundamento cientifico, los circulos juridico, de prensa y otros sociales de Japon elevan las voces de condena opinando que eso contraviene a la Constitucion de Japon y la ley de procedimiento penal y es un acto de violacion de DDHH y de discriminacion nacional contra los coreanos en Japon.
					
					La ACRCE condena el presente incidente como un atentado flagrante contra la soberania de la RPDC, una imprudente represion politica y acto violador de DDHH contra los coreanos en Japon y una anacronica maniobra conflictiva que inculca el sentimiento hostil en los pueblos de dos paises.
					
					Al finalizar, la nota manifiesta la esperanza de que las personalidades de diversos estratos japoneses y los pueblos del mundo, que aprecian la justicia y los DDHH, elevaran las voces de condena a las anacronicas maquinaciones anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon de los reaccionarios japoneses que llevan a la fase catastrofica las relaciones RPDC-Japon y siembran la desconfianza y hostilidad entre los pueblos de dos paises.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador chino
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador chino
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, recibio hoy en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular China en la RPDC, Li Chenqun.

articles.title: Efectuada sesion ampliada del CC de UTAC
articles.content:
Efectuada sesion ampliada del CC de UTAC
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en esta capital la reunion ampliada del 71o pleno del Comite Central de la Union de los Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea.
					Asistieron a la ocasion los miembros y los miembros suplentes del CC de la UTAC y los funcionarios de la misma organizacion en el centro y las localidades.
					
					En la ocasion hubo debates para materializar las tareas programaticas presentadas el historico discurso resumen pronunciado por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en la reunion ampliada del Buro Politico del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Tras el informe del presidente del CC del UTAC,  Ri Myong Gil, hubo intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el discurso resumen del Mariscal sirve de bandera combativa a tomar firmemente por los funcionarios y los gremiales de la UTAC en el cumplimiento de los legados del Dirigente.
					
					Se refirieron a los exitos y los defectos reportados durante los 3 anos pasados en el trabajo de la UTAC y presentaron las tareas y remedios para registrar cambio revolucionario en la lucha por materializar cabalmente los legados del Dirigente.
